attributes.action: Re-in-state some common sense on contencious issues!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly terrorists who plot and carry out attacks on law abiding and tax paying people should be not be sent to prison. Its bad enough that tax payers money can fund terrorists in some sort of various benefit or educational income, without having to pay for their prison fees for 40 years! They are willing to die, so provide them with there wish!
Also recent reports say that prisons are at their capacity of 81,000, whilst the Armed services of short of 6000 personnel.  Kill two birds with one stone?? Its not rocket science!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
